product_name: Giro Solara Road Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Giro Solara road bike shoes offer high-end performance at a great value, thanks to an easily adjustable and supportive fit along with stiff and resilient nylon outsoles. Lightweight microfiber synthetic leather and nylon mesh uppers give a glovelike fit with excellent breathability. Molded EVA footbeds with medium arch supports offer in-shoe comfort; AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment helps deter odors. Dupont Zytel(R) nylon soles efficiently transfer power to the pedals and provide greater fatigue resistance than traditional nylon soles. Strong and secure ratcheting buckle allows precise on-the-fly adjustability; buckle is replaceable. 2 rip-and-stick closure straps provide a solid, secure fit over insteps and are offset to maximize comfort and minimize pressure points. Giro Solara road bike shoes are compatible with 3-bolt cleats; please note that cleats are not included (cleats typically come with pedals).
short_description: The Giro Solara road bike shoes offer high-end performance at a great value, thanks to an easily adjustable and supportive fit along with stiff and resilient nylon outsoles.
